data.comment: 当前版本

data.name: Upgrade_Leave_Confirm
data.value: There are unsuccessful firmware after the upgrade, please confirm before leaving!
data.comment: 升级后存在有问题的固件，请确认后再离开！

data.name: Upgrade_Leave_InUpgrading
data.value: Upgrading in progress, please do not leave!
data.comment: 正在升级中，请勿离开！

data.name: Upgrade_StepInfo_Completed
data.comment: 升级完成

data.name: Upgrade_StepInfo_GetVersionAfterSelfCheck
data.comment: 获取自检结果后，等待重新获取版本号

data.name: Upgrade_StepInfo_InUpgrading
data.value: Upgrading in progress, unable to upgrade again

data.comment: 没有可升级的固件

data.comment: 发送电源重上电命令

data.comment: 发送硬件升级准备命令

data.comment: 通知ctbox设置为升级中状态

data.name: Upgrade_StepInfo_Upgrading
data.comment: 升级中...

data.name: Upgrade_StepInfo_WaitPowerRestartAndSelfCheckResult
data.value: Wait power restart and hardware self check result
data.comment: 等待电源重上电和硬件自检的结果

data.name: Upgrade_StepInfo_WaitPrepareResult
data.value: Hardware is preparing for upgrade, wait...
data.comment: 等待硬件升级准备的结果

data.name: Upgrade_Upgrade_Completed
data.comment: 升级完成

data.name: Upgrade_Upgrade_DialogMsg_FailedBeforeUpgrade
data.value: {0}: {1} Power restart automatically, please wait for restart to complete.
data.comment: 升级的弹窗信息：xxx失败，已自动重启，请等待重启完成

data.name: Upgrade_Upgrade_DialogMsg_FailedBeforeUpgradeAndREstartPowerError
data.comment: 升级的弹窗信息：xxx失败，自动重启失败，请人工重启电源并等待重启完成

data.name: Upgrade_Upgrade_DialogMsg_InUpgrading
data.value: Upgrading in progress, unable to upgrade again
data.comment: 升级的弹窗信息：正在升级中，无法再次升级

data.name: Upgrade_Upgrade_DialogMsg_NoCanUpgrade
data.comment: 升级的弹窗信息：没有可升级的固件

data.name: Upgrade_Upgrade_DialogMsg_Part_PrepareCommandError
data.comment: 升级的弹窗信息片段：发送升级前准备命令返回失败

data.name: Upgrade_Upgrade_DialogMsg_Part_PrepareResultError
data.comment: 升级的弹窗信息片段：硬件升级准备失败

data.name: Upgrade_Upgrade_DialogMsg_Part_SetUpgradingStatusError
data.value: Set ctbox to upgrading status failed
data.comment: 升级的弹窗信息片段：将ctbox设置为升级中状态失败

data.name: Upgrade_Upgrade_DialogMsg_RestartPowerCommandError
data.value: The upgrade is completed, but power restart automatically failed: {0} Please restart the power manually and wait for restart to complete.
data.comment: 升级的弹窗信息：升级已完成，自动重上电失败，请手动重上电

data.name: Upgrade_Upgrade_DialogMsg_RestartPowreManually
data.value: The upgrade is completed, please restart the power manually and wait for restart to complete.
data.comment: 升级的弹窗信息：升级已完成，请手动重上电

data.name: Upgrade_Upgrade_FailedItems
data.comment: 下述固件升级失败：{0}

data.name: Upgrade_Upgrade_Fail_GetVerError
data.value: Failed to get version after restart power.
data.comment: 升级失败，重上电后获取版本号失败

data.name: Upgrade_Upgrade_Fail_VerNotMatch
data.value: The version after restart power does not match the upgrade verision.
data.comment: 升级失败，重上电后获取到的版本号与升级的版本号不匹配
